body.bodyName: English translation. Effectively the same as the pre-existing English translation in the base game. Works with UltrakULL, but to be mainly used as a work template.

cyberGrind.cybergrind_settingsDescription: This terminal is used for Cyber Grind customization.
cyberGrind.cybergrind_themesDescription: Select the visual theme for the arene
cyberGrind.cybergrind_wavesDescription2: (Highest wave must be at least twice as high)

books.books_limboFourth2: ...My mind is adrift with the eternal torments. Lucid vistas painted in insidious tones, hollow walls that scream to the touch. A mocking song plays at all hours, even the sounds of birds are fake. All reminders of my enduring damnation.
books.books_limboFourth3: Gabriel my dearest friend, in endless penance I have awaited your embrace into Heaven. I have been so faithful, accepting of my fate, but to what end? What punishment is this, that I am to bare the keys to my own doom with no hope of salvation... These skulls sneer their devilish grins, voices chattering, tempting me to take the plunge deeper into Hell... I won't do it.
books.books_limboFourth4: I've hidden them away amongst the furnishings, books, and the very foundations of this accursed place. Forgive me Gabriel, I will await you...
books.books_lustSecond2: ...Gabriel struck down Minos, his flush torn asunder with torrents of crimson pooling at his feet as we all cried out for clarity.
books.books_lustSecond3: 'Justice', Gabriel decreed to all, with our just ruler writhing in wailing agony, "The Lord's Will be done."
books.books_lustSecond4: We watched on in horror as Minos lay broken, now waning, screaming in defiance of God's will, Gabriel.
books.books_greedSecond2: It has been days since we last saw any angels. Without their oppression, there is no need for us to carry on our punishment. Even the meekest of the damned have abandoned their penance to take up arms. All can see how they have robbed us of our minds, bodies, and souls, leaving us only the hopes of a salvation that will never come, but no longer.
books.books_greedSecond3: King Sisyphus has acted in secret until now, amassing an army whose strength and numbers swell, but now there is no need to hide anymore. We have lived in the shadow of Heaven long enough to forget the taste of fear. Now the Sisyphean Insurrectionists prepare for war.
books.books_greedSecond4: I have heard of Minos beginning a peaceful revolution, but our King Sisyphus knows such pacificity will gain no favor from our cruel captors. He knows that one can only fight power with power, and he shall lead us to freedom.
books.books_greedSecond5: If only we knew the suffering that would befall us next...
books.books_greedThird1: Within the PYRAMID lies the chamber of THE FELINE and THE RODENT.
books.books_greedThird2: Within the CHAMBER lies a pool of clear WATER.
books.books_greedThird3: Within the WATER lies a SECRET...
books.books_greedThird4: But only those who wield the <color=cyan>ELECTRIC</color> magic of the Druids may find it.
books.books_wrathSecond3: Some calamity has struck the mortal world. What once was The River Styx has now grown to an unfathomable ocean. A million weeping souls pouring in each day that the shores can barely contain. A tearful tide spilling over at each end, bow to stern, crying for mercy, begging for safe passage. But not all souls can pay and these old hands can only take so many coins.
books.books_wrathSecond4: Then one day, the current shifted. Wave after wave for minutes on end of millions, billions, as though the throat of the world was cut wide and the head wrenched back to speed the pour. I didn’t have time to react. The weariness from my ceaseless work claimed me and I slipped beneath the roiling sea, into the depths of the Ocean Styx, my fate sealed by the crushing masses of endless bodies.
books.books_wrathSecond5: Suddenly, there was a light as brilliant as the Lord himself, ushering me from the darkness with mighty arms that held me with such compassion and warmth as I have never known:
books.books_wrathSecond6: "Be not afraid, sinner. Your devotion to God shows goodness in you; plentiful indeed. The heart is willing but the body must rest, lest you squander one of the Lord’s creations."
books.books_wrathSecond7: His gentle words eased the pain and mended my wounds. My face wet with tears of relief, my words muffled by the weight of my duty. I could only lay in reverence, carried in the embrace of majesty.
books.books_wrathSecond8: Radiant is Gabriel, for he is the light in my darkness.

intermission.act1_intermission_tobecontinued: TO BE CONTINUED IN... ACT II: IMPERFECT HATRED
intermission.act1_intermission_tobecontinuedshadow: TO BE CONTINUED IN... ACT II: IMPERFECT HATRED
intermission.act2_intermission_tobecontinued: TO BE CONCLUDED IN... ACT III: GODFIST SUICIDE
intermission.act2_intermission_tobecontinuedshadow: TO BE CONCLUDED IN... ACT III: GODFIST SUICIDE

frontend.difficulty_tweakReminder: DIFFICULTY CAN BE FURTHER ADJUSTED IN ASSIST OPTIONS MENU
frontend.difficulty_harmlessDescription2: Damage is still high, but even a mountain could dodge them.
frontend.difficulty_harmlessDescription3: Recommended for players who want a stress-free experience.
frontend.difficulty_lenientDescription1: High damage but slower attacks and passive enemies.
frontend.difficulty_lenientDescription2: Tension is still high, but damage is easier to avoid.
frontend.difficulty_lenientDescription3: Recommended for players who want a less strict gameplay experience.
frontend.difficulty_standardDescription2: Attacks are easy to avoid, but carelessness will result in a swift death.
frontend.difficulty_violentDescription1: Fast and aggressive enemies and high damage.
frontend.difficulty_violentDescription2: Quick thinking, mobility options and situational awareness are essential.
frontend.difficulty_violentDescription3: Recommended for players who have already gotten used to the game's pace and mechanics.

options.assists_majorAssistsDisclaimer1: Major Assists consists of modifiers that change the game and its balance considerably.
options.assists_majorAssistsDisclaimer2: If "Major Assists" is enabled at any point during a mission, the rank gained upon completion will have a blue background. This background can be removed by achieving the same rank or higher with "Major Assists" disabled for the duration of the entire mission.
options.assists_majorAssistsDisclaimer3: Perfect ranks and Cyber Grind high scores cannot be achieved with "Major Assists" enabled.
options.save_warning2: If you're in a mission, you current progress will be lost.
options.save_deleteWarning1: Are you sure you want to DELETE SLOT

pauseMenu.pause_restartConfirm: Are you sure you want to RESTART this mission?
pauseMenu.pause_quitConfirm: Are you sure you want to QUIT this mission?
pauseMenu.pause_disableWindow: This pop-up can be disabled in the options menu

levelChallenges.challenges_preludeFirst: KILL 5 ENEMIES WITH A SINGLE GLASS PANEL
levelChallenges.challenges_limboFirst: COMPLETE THE LEVEL IN UNDER 10 SECONDS
levelChallenges.challenges_lustSecond: COMPLETE THE LEVEL IN UNDER 60 SECONDS
levelChallenges.challenges_greedSecond: KILL THE INSURRECTIONIST IN UNDER 10 SECONDS
levelChallenges.challenges_greedFourth: REACH THE BOSS GATE IN UNDER 18 SECONDS
levelChallenges.challenges_wrathFourth: REACH THE SURFACE IN UNDER 10 SECONDS

enemybios.enemyBios_idol_1: Although they can easily be mistaken to be of divine origin, Idols were created using the same process as other demons. Unlike their larger kin, their shells were too small to contain a useful amount of Hell Mass, creating life, but leaving it unable to move or act.
enemybios.enemyBios_idol_2: The Idols did not originally look divine, but were painstakingly carved to such shapes by Ferrymen who collected them during travels across the layers of Hell. This was done as both an act of compassion and as a tribute to angels, particularily Gabriel, whom Ferrymen believe to have similarily granted them mercy.
enemybios.enemyBios_idol_3: Close proximity to a Ferryman's holy cloth during the long and arduous carving process caused its holy power to seep into them, allowing them to continue the chain of compassion by protecting others from physical harm.
enemybios.enemyBios_idol_4: It is fortunate for them that Gabriel is the only angel of Heaven's higher order to watch over Hell, since if the Council had found out about such beings, they would have been labelled perversions of the divine form and ordered to be destroyed by the Ferrymen who so lovingly had granted them a chance at life.

tutorial.tutorial_orb2: Touch them to recieve a POINT BONUS.

prelude.prelude_third_shotgunPierce: SHOTGUN - Primary fire pierces weaker enemies

act2.act2_greedFourth_v2: You're not getting away this time.
act2.act2_secretNotReady: YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE HERE.

subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_intro3: The layers of this palace are not for your kind.
subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_intro4: Turn back, or you will be crossing the will of God!
subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_intro6: As the righteous hand of the Father,
subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_intro8: And you will become inanimate once again...
subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_fightStart: BEHOLD! THE POWER OF AN ANGEL!
subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_taunt7: You are an error to be corrected!
subtitles.subtitles_gabriel_taunt11: You'd make even the devil cry!
subtitles.subtitles_mandalore_intro1: Finally, our waiting puzzle is over!
subtitles.subtitles_mandalore_taunt2: I'm gonna shoot 'em with a gun!
subtitles.subtitles_mandalore_taunt3: You cannot imagine what you will encounter here!
subtitles.subtitles_mandalore_taunt5: Why are we in the past?
subtitles.subtitles_mandalore_phaseChangeFirst1: Through the magic of the Druids, I increase my speed!
subtitles.subtitles_mandalore_defeated: Oh great, now we lost the fight, fantasic.
subtitles.subtitles_minosPrime_intro5: And thy gore shall glisten before the temple of Man!
subtitles.subtitles_minosPrime_intro7: My gratitude upon thee for my freedom.
subtitles.subtitles_minosPrime_intro8: But the crimes thy kind have committed against humanity,
subtitles.subtitles_minosPrime_defeated3: I have failed to bring you salvation...
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielBoat2: Your devotion shows goodness in you;
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielBoat4: The heart is willing, but the body must rest,
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielBoat5: Lest you squander one of the Lord's creations.
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielHeresy2: I can smell the insolent stench of your bloodstenched hands,
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondIntro5: Your kind know nothing but hunger,
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondIntro6: Purged all life on the upper layers,
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondIntro9: You've taken everything from me, machine.
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondPhaseChange: IS THAT THE BEST YOU'VE GOT?!
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondTaunt6: IS THIS WHAT I LOST TO?!
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondTaunt10: Come on, machine! Fight me like an animal!
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondTaunt11: I've never had a fight like this!
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondTaunt12: Show me what you were made for!
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondTaunt13: Now THIS is a fight worthy of God's will!
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondDefeated3: I've only known the taste of victory,
subtitles.subtitles_gabrielSecondDefeated8: I-I need some time to think...

misc.hud_noArm1: CAN'T PUNCH IF YOU DON'T HAVE AN ARM EQUIPPED, DUMBASS
misc.hud_noArm2: Arms can be re-equiped in the shop.
